abstract: 'At the time, I thought it was cool and I thought I was doing nothing wrong.'
description: When Christiana Dumitru's father died and her family had to move, she turned to a partying lifestyle. Hooked on drugs at an alarmingly young age, Dumitru reflects on the strength of will she had to summon to get back on track and the friends and family she has learnt to value.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002321; Western stories : expressions for the future; Active; 2010
